naslov: KUĆA, NAJAM ZA RADNIKE, ZAGREB, REMETE, 326 m2, 7-sobna (iznajmljivanje)
opis: KUĆA, NAJAM, ZAGREB, REMETE, 326 m2, 7-sobna Iznajmljuje se 7-sobna kuća stambene površine 326 m², smještena u mirnom i zelenom dijelu Remeta, pogodna za smještaj 18 radnika. Kuća se sastoji od prizemlja i prvog kata, a nudi ukupno sedam soba, od čega je šest spavaćih, jedna prostrana kuhinja, tri kupaonice, te dvije ostave. Kući pripada i 600 m² uređene okućnice, s velikim dvorištem iza kuće u kojem se nalazi kamin. Kuća posjeduje i garažu, kao i 3 dodatna parkirna mjesta unutar dvorišta. Grijanje: etažno-plinsko centralno. Svaka soba opremljena je vlastitom klima jedinicom. Kuća je u odličnom stanju, opremljena te useljiva od 1.7.2025. godine. Mirna lokacija s brzom povezanošću prema centru grada i glavnim prometnicama, udaljena pet minuta pješice od autobusne stanice. Ova nekretnina predstavlja idealan izbor za tvrtke koje žele kvalitetan i udoban smještaj za svoje zaposlenike u Zagrebu. Vlasništvo 1/1 HOUSE FOR RENT, ZAGREB, REMETE, 326 m² A 7-room house with a living area of 326 m² is available for rent in the quiet and green neighborhood of Remete, ideal for accommodating 18 workers. The house consists of a ground floor and a first floor, offering a total of seven rooms, including six bedrooms, a spacious kitchen, three bathrooms, and two storage rooms. The property includes a landscaped yard of 600 m², with a large backyard featuring a fireplace. There is also a garage and three additional parking spaces within the fenced area. Heating is gas-powered, with a central system divided by floors. Each room is equipped with its own air conditioning unit. The house is in excellent condition, fully equipped, and move-in ready from July 1st, 2025. The location is peaceful, with quick access to the city center and main roads, just a five-minute walk from the nearest bus stop. This property is an ideal choice for companies looking for quality and comfortable accommodation for their employees in Zagreb.
